entries.description: Stopped overriding upstream chart tolerations for logging/promtail by default. Added `node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane` toleration.
Fixed an issue with wrong Corefile in NodeLocal DNSCache mounts. Added support for a kube-dns configmap for NodeLocal DNSCache to allow customization of dns.
Fixed an issue where creating Clusters through ClusterTemplates was failing without leaving any trace.
Fixed an API error in extended disk configuration for the Anexia provider.
